title: Gang Gang Esports Recruiting OOL 2018 Split 1 - This is Dia+ players only

embed.description: Some notes before filling out application. Unfortunately we CANNOT pay players/coaches/managers so if you're in it for the money don't bother. This is for OOL 2018 but we will be scrimming and entering competitions as soon as we have the team finalised. Players Must be Diamond 5 or above currently.

body:
No payment is available for players / coaches / managers ;(
For OOL Split 2
Will be entering comps this year for practice / scrims
